fixes.name: Top N Filter
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR _Param = SELECTEDVALUE('Top N'[Display As])
VAR _Rank = RANKX(
    ALLSELECTED('test+'),
    CALCULATE(SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day])),
    ,
    DESC,
    DENSE
)
RETURN
_Rank <= _Param
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau RANK(SUM(...)) with DAX RANKX over ALLSELECTED('test+') and SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day]). Replaced Tableau parameter [Parameters].[Top N] with SELECTEDVALUE('Top N'[Display As]). Column references converted to 'test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day]. Returns a boolean comparing the computed rank against the selected parameter.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The formula uses aggregation (SUM) and a table calculation (RANK) and references a parameter; such logic requires a measure in Power BI.
